title.rendered: AGC of California Recognizes Alticor Inc Safety Personnel and Performance

content.rendered:
The Associated General Contractors of California Recognized Alticor Inc for two prestigious awards at the Fall Conference in Palm Springs on October 23rd.

Monte Bridgewater, Alticor Inc Director of Safety and Health in Southern California, was named The Harry Eckstein Safety Professional of the Year. This award recognizes safety professionals that go above and beyond the borders of their employer, distinguishing him or her by giving back to the industry. This very prestigious award exemplifies the most dedicated and innovative professionals and their active participation in the advancement of the safety management process, both within their company, and in the construction industry.

Alticor Inc received the first place award in the Building Division, Over One Million Worker Hours Category. This award recognizes companies for their dedication and innovation to safety in the construction industry.

excerpt.rendered: The Associated General Contractors of California Recognized Alticor Inc for two prestigious awards at the Fall Conference in Palm Springs.
